website_summaries.verdict: Between its extremely straightforward controls, high-resolution camera, and many self-preserving fail-safe features, the Tello is the perfect drone for kids and first-time drone pilots.
pros: Simple design is great for beginners
Includes 3 batteries, battery charging hub, and 4 pairs of propellers
cons: Veteran drone fliers may not be impressed with this little model

customer_reviews.title: Yay for Tello!
customer_reviews.text: I still consider myself a novice to the hobby. The quality and ease of use makes this drone such a great buy. I would consider it Apple quality in the drone world. Lots of fun functionality. Uses App for controller unless you purchase the Gamesir T1d controller. Long battery life and takes decent video and pictures. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Fisherofmen

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Cheap but usable. Very fast. I would reccomend extending the range which helped with high flying photos and video stability. I did not get a controller and I am glad, less to worry about when traveling and i can control this very well with just my S8+.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S.

customer_reviews.title: Very best small drone for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent small drone. Best on the market for the price. Others I've purchased in this price range do not begin to compare with Tello Includes a great app for the iPhone with video and photo storage. My primary drone is a DJI Mavic Pro and I fly the Tello both indoors and outside when wind is low. Works fine with cell phone interface and adding a controller is nice but certainly not essential.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome starter drone, and awesome customer service, had an issue with the first drone I received, would not power on after 5th or 6th flight....requested a replacement and had it in 2 days, before I even sent the first one back!
customer_reviews.author: MFE187

customer_reviews.title: Batteriees are no good after two uses.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a month ago. My second flight, two of the three batteries will not take a charge. This is extremely upsetting as I chose this package because of the extra batteries. Buy from someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Jackilynn H Millard

customer_reviews.title: fragile and temperamental
customer_reviews.text: As most others have reported, flying it inside even if bright light results in regular freakouts complaining about low light conditions, at which point the drone does random stuff. On 2nd or 3rd flight, a popup on iOS blocked the app while it was in the middle of one of those freakouts, it crashed into the wall and broke the blade cage, and that's that. Not ready for prime time, and of course the bundle comes with a bunch of random stuff including a lens cleaner, but doesn't come with more blade covers. Lens cleaner went in garbage immediately. probably entire thing goes in garbage now? not going to spend more money on blade covers.
customer_reviews.author: matt b

customer_reviews.title: Good toy. Not good in wind. Mediocre.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cheap, fun for kids and beginners. Easy to use to fly. Cons: Cant handle even light wind. Super short battery. Photo/Videos need relatively bright conditions. 32 foot high limit and super short range will be disappointment for many. After my Breeze broke I got this. Not at all in same class, even though got breeze for same price a year earlier. Now, breeze is 399. Perhaps worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Purple

customer_reviews.title: Perfect drone!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool drone!! The only thing is the wings are delicate and can damage easily in which case your drone won’t be able to fly! So having extra wings is a must!! We love the drone, it’s perfect for our 10 year old!! Everyone really enjoys flying it!! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I don't leave many reviews but what a disappointment. I was expecting a decent dji beginner drone. Don't waste your money. Did not hold altitude well except indoors and any wind at all, you have little control or no control. Sometimes hand gestures worked but mostly not. 8 or 9 min run time isnt good
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Charging station sucks
customer_reviews.text: Nice drone but the charging unit sucks I have had to return the drone because the charging unit doesn’t display correctly I thought DJI was better than this After spending the money I am frustrated! Since having these problems the company made good on the charging station This is a awesome drone it is easy to fly I would definitely recommend this company and drone to anyone I’m very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Great drone, batteries are useless
customer_reviews.text: Drone is simple and easy to use, however the batteries that come with this unit are trash. The batteries last maybe 10 mins on a full charge and if they are not in charging continuously the batteries will not hold a charge. Do not buy this set buy the drone itself and maybe order different batteries. The ones that come with this set SUCK!!
customer_reviews.author: John Lundgren

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for the drone... 5 stars for the seller!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 13yo nephew and he loves it. The drone is easy to control and flies really well. He’s loving it! I ended up ordering another one for myself. The seller is very responsive and I had an item missing from one of the packages which he immediately addressed. I will definitely purchase this bundle again from this seller.

customer_reviews.author: fbhd

customer_reviews.title: Best gift

customer_reviews.title: Do not lose your drone

The first flight have been very very sad, I lost control of the drone and lost it. I will buy it again (just the drone).

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Motorola phones (and many others).

customer_reviews.title: Little drone - big fun!

customer_reviews.title: Controller is separate, what a bummer.

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great drone for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I love DJI drones (I know this is technical not DJI)! I bought this for my 9 year old. He loves it! Great control but you need a phone to fly it. I gave my son my old IPHONE 6+ and it’s great! I find myself playing with the Tello more than my new Mavic 2 pro lol. customer_reviews.title: Seller selling LEMONS!!!! Be AWARE

I didn’t even open it for months and went to use it today and it doesn’t work at all. Not a huge deal but it would be nice to charge more than one batter at a time.

customer_reviews.title: Beginner's drone that makes you feel like a pro
customer_reviews.text: Best beginners drone around, super easy to fly, long flight times, VG app. Even works well in 5 MPH wind
